What You Can Configure for the Workstation

Using Customize, you can configure the items like the following:

l Access to remote patients

Set the type of access to remote patients

l Automatic log off time

Set automatic log off interval

l Screen display when no user is logged on

For more information, see “Hide patient data after user log off” on page 95

l Time-related parameters for orders

Early documentation limit

Order extension period

Extend order time limit

Documentation limit for finished orders

Time limit for documenting tasks

Default starting time for orders added during a session

Rounded starting time for orders

Session start time as the default starting time for orders

Default time for documenting a task

l Fluid and medication parameters

IV base solution volumes

Required ID number for blood bags

Decimal places in doses and volumes

Number of digits for rounding flowsheet values

Doses outside reference range

Modification of doses in medication and fluid orders

l Performance options related to the database

Frequency of database access

Screen refresh rate/scroll speed

l Prompts and messages displayed to users

Prompt users for confirmation

Acknowledge completion of tasks

Assessments multi-selection symbol

l Parameters related to assessments, QA Indicators and equipment items.

Assessments multi-selection symbol

Assessments box height

Assessments note symbol

Quality assurance criteria on flowsheets

l Event sets and event macros

Create or edit an event set

Configure an event set as a macro
